```{r setup}
library(minvariance)
library(tidyverse)
library(lavaan)
library(semPlot)
```

## Load data

```{r data}
data_url <- "https://quantdev.ssri.psu.edu/sites/qdev/files/ECLS_Science.csv"

df <- read_csv(file = url(data_url)) %>% 
  select("id", 
         "s_g3", "r_g3", "m_g3", 
         "s_g5", "r_g5", "m_g5", 
         "s_g8", "r_g8", "m_g8")

# Rename so functions work
timepoints <- list(t3 = c("s_g3", "r_g3", "m_g3"), 
                   t5 = c("s_g5", "r_g5", "m_g5"), 
                   t8 = c("s_g8", "r_g8", "m_g8"))
```

## lavaan objects

```{r, warning=F}

minvariance(data = df, 
            var_list = timepoints, 
            return = "lavaan_objects")

```

## Fit statistics

```{r, warning=F}
minvariance(data = df, 
            var_list = timepoints, 
            return = "fit_statistics") %>% 
  knitr::kable(digits = 3)
```

## Model tests

```{r, warning=F}

minvariance(data = df, 
                 var_list = timepoints, 
                 return = "model_tests") %>% 
  knitr::kable(digits = 3)

```

## lavaan syntax


```{r}

lminvar_syntax <- minvariance(data = df, 
                             var_list = timepoints, 
                             return = "lavaan_syntax") 

```

```{r}
lminvar_syntax$configural %>% 
  cat()

```
